state: Welcome to another life changing session of TextWorld! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to attempt to travel west. And then, look and see that the portal is unlocked. Then, doublecheck that the portal in the shower is ajar. And then, make an attempt to travel south. After that, try to take a trip east. And then, head south. That done, make an attempt to travel west. That done, venture south. And then, venture south. And then, go to the east. Okay, and then, make an attempt to head north. And then, try to take a trip east. After that, move north. After that, lift the passkey from the floor of the attic. Alright, thanks! -= Sauna =- You've just sauntered into a sauna. You begin to take stock of what's here. There is an open gateway leading west. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Sauna =-0/1
next_state: -= Shower =- You're now in the shower. There is a closed portal leading south. There is an open gateway leading east. > -= Shower =-0/2

state: -= Shower =- You're now in the shower. There is a closed portal leading south. There is an open gateway leading east. > -= Shower =-0/2

next_state: -= Bedroom =- You've just walked into a bedroom. You scan the room, seeing a trunk. Huh, weird. Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this? There is an open portal leading north. There is an open door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Bedroom =-0/8

next_state: -= Dish-Pit =- I am honoured to announce that you are now in the dish-pit. You scan the room for a rack, and you find a rack. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a rack? The rack is normal. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a board. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. You see a chair. However, the chair, like an empty chair, has nothing on it. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Dish-Pit =-0/9
